name: Bella Pizza

review.reviewBody: Awesome pizza & excellent owner/staff working there. consistently delicious. Keep it up guys!
pizza and wings were fine. but Bella forgot the pop I ordered. NO more Bella pizza if they can't send what I paid for. unbelievable.
Bella chicken Pizza was awful! Smelt bad and Chicken tasted bad! Weird and salty. Had to throw it out. Lost us as a customer.
Love the spaghetti and Meatballs , and usually enough for two meals, the meatballs are huge
Still the best pizza in south Burnaby/Vancouver are. Always very good. Thanks Bella guys. Cheers!
